Record.ClassificationPath: Skin and Connective Tissue Diseases/Connective Tissue Diseases/alpha 1-Antitrypsin Deficiency
Record.Description: Deficiency of the protease inhibitor ALPHA 1-ANTITRYPSIN, leading primarily to degradation of elastin of the alveolar walls, as well as other structural proteins of a variety of tissues. (From Scriver, Beaudet, Sly, & Valle, The Metabolic and Molecular Bases of Inherited Disease, 7th ed, p4125)
